game.name: Rogue Night
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gather, build, explore, quest, and survive a zombie apocalypse that is set in a medieval fantasy world. Unlock permanent upgrades with the heads of zombies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gather, build, explore, quest, and survive a zombie apocalypse that is set in a medieval fantasy world. Unlock permanent upgrades with the heads of zombies.
